      • chooseIntChannelProperty

        public static int chooseIntChannelProperty(java.lang.String listenAddressName,
                                           java.lang.String propertySuffix,
                                           int defaultValue)
        First looks for a property specific to the named listen address of the form - "server.${addrName}.${propertySuffix}". If none found, then looks for a server-wide property of the form - "server.${propertySuffix}". If that is also not found, then returns the specified default value.

      • chooseBooleanChannelProperty

        public static boolean chooseBooleanChannelProperty(java.lang.String listenAddressName,
                                                   java.lang.String propertySuffix,
                                                   boolean defaultValue)
